We're continuously learning and adjusting our practices.
Here are some of the ways we've approached our work.

landing_page.title: Welcome to Learning Resources
landing_page.description: Learning Resources shares resources grounded in our work at the Canadian Digital Service to help fellow public servants improve service delivery.
landing_page.slogan: Service delivery is hard. We can help.
